#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int getInteger() {
	int n = 0;
	int ch = getchar();
	int sign = 1;
	while(ch < '0' || ch > '9') {
	if (ch == '-') sign = -1; 
	ch = getchar();
	}
	while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
	n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + ch - '0', ch = getchar();
	n = n*sign;

	return n;
}


int main(){

	int test,flag;
	long long int y,a,n,i,x;;

	cin>>test;
	while(test--){

		cin>>n;

		flag=0;
		for(i=2;i<=60;i++){

			x=round(pow(n,1.0/i));

			a=x;
			y=1;
			for(int j=0;j<i;j++)
				y*=a;

			if((long long int)(n)==y){

				flag=1;
				break;
			}

		}

		if(flag)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;

	}	
	return 0;

}
